title: Automation of Business Intelligence Models: Case Study Learning Based on Scientific Inquiry-Driven Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level background in data science (statistics, machine learning) with practical experience. Basic understanding of experimental design and result analysis: foundational knowledge of the scientific inquiry process (hypothesis formulation, variable control, data collection, analysis, conclusion drawing)
context.additional_context: Lightweight practical modules designed for smartphone-based learning environments. VR simulations for real business scenario experiences and scientific inquiry reinforcement: scientific analysis procedures (data collection, model validation, result interpretation) in virtual lab settings.

learning_goals: Develop predictive modeling and scientific experimentation skills in smartphone environments using AutoML tools (RapidMiner/Python): systematically perform hypothesis setting, variable control, data measurement, and result analysis.

In an Airbnb accommodation price prediction case study, learners can analyze over ten data variables, implement linear regression and decision tree models using Python's scikit-learn, compare RMSE and R² scores between models, and describe three key insights (e.g., price influencing factors, model performance differences, variable importance) within 500 characters: conduct comparative analysis and statistical significance testing to derive evidence-based conclusions.

Within three weeks, learners can tune five hyperparameters (number of trees, max depth, min samples split, etc.) of a random forest regression model in a Python-based simulation environment (Jupyter Notebook) via grid search or Bayesian optimization, compare performance metrics (R², RMSE) of the optimized model against the baseline using scientific methodology (hypothesis-experiment-analysis), and submit a report showing ≥10% improvement: quantitatively evaluate model enhancement effects and document reproducible research processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
